text: Colegio Alemán de Guatemala () is a German international school in Zone 11, Guatemala City."Contáctenos "/"Kontakt ." Colegio Alemán de Guatemala. Retrieved on 15 March 2015. "Dirección: Diagonal 21, 19-20 zona 11 Apartado Postal: 908, Guatemala, C.A." It serves levels kindergarten through bachillerato (senior high school)."Niveles "/"Schulstufen ." Colegio Alemán de Guatemala. Retrieved on 15 March 2015. It is categorized as a German school abroad by the Zentralstelle für das Auslandsschulwesen. It is one of more than 140 German schools abroad and has the status of an encounter school with a bicultural school goal, i.e. it leads to the German Abitur as well as the national Bachillerato. ==History== The school was founded on 1 January 1901 by the Asociación de Educación y Cultura "Alejandro von Humboldt"."Quienes Somos "/"Über uns ." Colegio Alemán de Guatemala. Retrieved on 15 March 2015. At the celebration of its 100th anniversary in 2001, the German School Guatemala was awarded the "Orden del Quetzal en grado de Gran Cruz" by the Guatemalan government for its outstanding educational work. ==References== ==External links== * Colegio Alemán de Guatemala * Colegio Alemán de Guatemala * Holm, Carsten. " Streit mit reichen Eltern: Leiter der Deutschen Schule floh aus Guatemala" (). Der Spiegel. 15 May 2015. Category:German international schools in North America Category:Schools in Guatemala City Category:International schools in Guatemala Category:Educational institutions established in 1901
title: Colegio Alemán de Guatemala
